comments.en:
When used with HP's "hplip" driver, this printer does the dithering and color adjustment internally. As input it takes simple RGB data as used for screen display.

For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Consumables/Refills: 4 cartridges: one for each color of CMYK. Also 4 replaceable printheads.
